text: Franck Balandier (11 July 1952 – 17 December 2020) was a French writer. He was a member of the Société des gens de lettres. Balandier wrote his first novel in 1988. Balandier died on 17 December 2020 in Paris at the age of 68. ==Publications== ===Novels=== *Les Nuits périphériques (1988) *L’Homme à la voiture rouge (2000) *Ankylose (2005) *Le Silence des rails (2014) *Le Corps parfait des araignées (2017) *Gazoline Tango (2017) *APO (2018) ===Biographies=== *Les Prisons d’Apollinaire (2001) *Des poètes derrière les barreaux (2012) *Le Paris d'Apollinaire (2018) ===Poetry=== *Les Hommes sans épaules *L'Heure tiède (2019) ===News=== *Clito, Osez vingt histoires de sexe au soleil (2019) ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French novelists Category:French poets
